prod_desc: Unleash mighty Macy and send the Stone monsters running!
prod_long_desc:
Turn Macy into the toughest knight in the realm with this LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit play set, featuring a buildable battle suit with posable limbs, minifigure cockpit, super-sized mace, giant fist and a Combo NEXO Power shield. Includes five scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game and a new-for-spring-2017 Macy minifigure.
Includes a new-for-spring-2017 Macy minifigure.
Features a buildable battle suit with highly posable limbs and a minifigure cockpit.
Also includes a super-sized buildable mace with translucent-orange head.
Accessory elements include a Combo NEXO Power shield and five scannable NEXO Powers.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' permission.
Scan shields for each of the five NEXO Powers (Wrecking Ball, Iron Dragon, Battle Cry, Slime Blast and Mightiness) and create your own combinations to power up and defeat the Stone monsters in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Combine with vehicles in other LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to enhance the battle suit with futuristic functions!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Stands over 3” tall.
